ComicInfo.Penciller: Doug Mahnke,Rich Rice,Everett Peck,Doug Mahnke,Rich Rice,Everett Peck
ComicInfo.Summary: Homicide returns with another dark, yet exciting episode, written by John Arcudi, art by Doug Mahnke. Also, Bob the Alien blunders through another aspect of life (is he really so different from any of us on a bad day?) from creator Rich Rice, and we present a second offering from Andrew Murphy entitled "Pressed for Time".
ComicInfo.Title: Blood Storm; Moves In; The Mime Murders
ComicInfo.Writer: Andrew Murphy,Everett Peck,John Arcudi,Rich Rice,John Arcudi,Rich Rice,Everett Peck
